page.title: 07Armthorpe Sports Centre.
page.content:
The Centre was opened in{1974.} The people who use the Centre come from about a twenty mile radius. The activities include swimming, squash, aerobics, badminton and keep-fit. There are different prices for the different activities.
Upstairs there is a large clubroom, which can be used for meetings. Sometimes it can be used for parties and discos. During the day it is used for badminton, keep-fit and aerobics.
In the swimming changing rooms there is a foot bath, two showers, and some toilets. For mothers with toddlers there is a small play pen. There are two pools - a large one for good swimmers and a small one for beginners.
